elements.description: A young minstrel who likes singing and cats.

elements.description: A young minstrel who likes singing and cats.

elements.label: The Soldier
elements.description: The soldier was a cook in the tavern. Until they took off the apron, and decided to follow the knight, just like old times.

slots.label: Companion
slots.description: The soldier should invite the knight to come along.

elements.label: The Neighboring Lord
elements.description: A neighboring lord, visiting the local monastry.

elements.label: The Prior
elements.description: A prior who is not so popolar in the parish.

elements.label: The Pilgrim
elements.description: Before going on the pilgrimage, the pilgrim was a landlord in the neighboring town.

elements.label: The First Cook Candidate
elements.description: This cook claims that they were trained in a foreign land. They are specialized in wine-making and novel dishes.

elements.label: The Second Cook Candidate
elements.description: This young cook doesn't talk much about their own training or experience. They simply ask the taverner to let them make a few signature dishes.

elements.label: The Third Cook Candidate
elements.description: This cook was the former cook of the baron. The scribe knows that they are too often drunk, and their seafood-making skill is questionable.

elements.label: The Cook
elements.description: A cook who is sassy and talkative. They are always willing to try out new ideas.

elements.label: The Cook
elements.description: A cook who is a quick learner at everything. They seldom make mistakes.

elements.label: The Cook
elements.description: A cook who is experienced yet careless. It is probably a mistake to recruit them.

elements.label: The Rookie
elements.description: A rookie who is talented at various weapons and fighting techniques. They never undergone formal training.
